LanguageData.Amnesia.stages.0.label: Blackout
LanguageData.Amnesia.stages.0.description: I suddenly forgot everything, that's not good.
LanguageData.EclipseSubEventAFeral.stages.0.label: A nightmare is happening
LanguageData.EclipseSubEventAFeral.stages.0.descripti: First an eclipse an now this! when is this nightmare going to end.
LanguageData.EclipseSubEventBMeteor.stages.0.label: Survived a meteor apocalypse
LanguageData.EclipseSubEventBMeteor.stages.0.descript: I looked at death itself, good thing I'm still here.
LanguageData.Rescued.stages.0.label: I could go home.
LanguageData.Rescued.stages.0.description: The feeling that you can go home after having experienced so much is tantalizing, but I just can't leave this planet. This place is now my home.
LanguageData.MeteorShower.stages.0.label: I looked at a meteor shower.
LanguageData.MeteorShower.stages.0.description: The cosmos, still so beautiful even after abandoning me here.
LanguageData.SolarFlareSubEventACosmicRadiation.stage: Everything went black for a few seconds, and most colonists were down on their knees, my head hurts like hell.
LanguageData.NuclearFalloutThought.stages.0.label: Nuke accident
